item.title: Report X-2024081721
item.description:
Report X-2024081721

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-28T15:13:27+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-08-23
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Federal Express Corporation
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: Plastic jugs in corrugated inner and outer cartons. No hazard markings or arrows on exterior, despite "NO-AIR" on shipping label and LQ mark on inner carton. Loose caps came off two jugs and contents spilled, soiling jugs and damaging cartons.
